thread.section_title: Aran Sweater Market Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Aran Sweater Market | aransweatermarket.com
thread.title: Anna Katarina Berglund
thread.title_full: Aran Sweater Market reviewed by Anna Katarina Berglund

author: Anna Katarina Berglund
title: Anna Katarina Berglund
text: I love the sweaters, coatigans and hats. I once bought one scarf, but ARan charged me for two. We decided they'd send me an extra and they really did. With DHL! :). I was very pleased with the service and kindness in our communication.
